dialog.text: Oh shit, went to organise my work ready for submission and deleted some of my old reflection files 😨 That's all I need right now!  How was your weekend?

Bit lonely without Pete, I did message him back in the end but told him to go find himself someone else to f... oops better not put that in here :wink:.  Mum was right - time to move on.  I ended up watching Netflix and eating a whole tub of Ben and Jerry's :woozy_face:  Spent some time tidying up my room so I can try using my webcam this week.  At least I don't have Pete's clothes lying around the room now.   Did you manage to get much done over the weekend?

joins.text: Sounds like you did loads, I'd better get a move on as we only have 2 weeks left.
Better get to it, only two weeks to go!

dialog.text: I got Jeff to look over some of my reflections.  He said I wrote like a five year old - ha, what a cheek!  Am going to ask for some feedback today from Tom and Douglas.  Got to go - team meeting.
